title: Chickasaw National Recreation Area: Horseback Riding
body: Horseback Riding        Riding the Rock Creek Trail Rick Thompson   Â    Share the trail; Spare the trail Only the Rock Creek Multi-use trail system is open to horseback riding. These trails are also open to hiking and biking. Hikers should be alert to riders; Hikers must yield to riders. If horses approach, hikers should step off the trail and stand quietly until they pass. Motorized vehicles are NOT permitted on these trails. Please protect the environment by riding and hiking only on the marked trails. Trailer parking and turn-around space is available at the north trailhead area adjacent to Veterans Lake.
